vipAdvantages.title: Our best prices
vipAdvantages.text: Trade on our tightest spreads and lowest commissions.

vipAdvantages.title: Priority client support
vipAdvantages.text: Receive dedicated 24/5 support from our world-class trading experts.

vipAdvantages.title: Personal expert meetups
vipAdvantages.text: Discuss market movements and outlooks with the AAG.

vipAdvantages.title: Exclusive event invitations
vipAdvantages.text: Attend the most prestigious money-can’t-buy events.

fxTrade.title: Ultra-competitive FX spreads
fxTrade.text: Trade major Forex pairs from 0.4 pips. Competitive entry prices and even lower rates for active traders.

fxTrade.title: Best-in-className execution
fxTrade.text: Tier-1 liquidity gives higher fill-rates, fewer premature stop-outs and significant price improvements.

fxTrade.title: Award-winning platform
fxTrade.text: Benefit from integrated Trade Signals, news feeds and innovative risk-management features.

fxTrade.title: Expert service, trusted for 25 years
fxTrade.text: With 800,000+ satisfied customers, AAGMarkets offers world-className service around the clock.

clientSupport.title: Dedicated sales trader
clientSupport.text: Receive expert one-to-one support, market commentary, assistance placing complex orders and a sparring mate for trading strategies and risk management whenever markets are open.

clientSupport.title: Personal relationship manager
clientSupport.text: Get access to new features, products, curated news and exclusive event invites from your relationship manager. Your personal point of contact is on hand to help with platform, trading and account queries, in your local language.

clientSupport.title: Senior management
clientSupport.text: Discuss market outlooks with the most important players and get the view from inside our business. As a VIP, members of our senior management team are always available to take your call and listen to your feedback.

eventsBlock.title: Flagship events
eventsBlock.text: Attend our market-focused flagship events at the most exclusive venues.

eventsBlock.title: Topical debates
eventsBlock.text: Join our insightful, expert-led talks, tailored to current market events.

eventsBlock.title: Chef’s tables
eventsBlock.text: Discuss market movements over dinner at some of the world’s finest places.

eventsBlock.title: Chef’s tables
eventsBlock.text: Reserve the best seats at the biggest entertainment and sporting events.

startTrading.title: Register
startTrading.text: Signup and confirm your email address to get instant access to our Trader's Room and MT4 trading platform. (~30 seconds).

startTrading.title: Fund
startTrading.text: Deposit USD or Bitcoin using multiple payment methods to fund your personal account. (~2 minutes).

startTrading.title: Trade
startTrading.text: Start trading multiple assets with leverage and the lowest fees.

whyTrade.title: Global market access
whyTrade.text: Trade more than 40,000 instruments across forex, stocks, options, ETFs, commodities, futures, bonds and mutual funds.

whyTrade.title: Powerful platforms
whyTrade.text: Access both our platforms, the award-winning AAGMarkets and professional-grade AAG TraderPRO, from one account.

whyTrade.title: Industry-leading prices
whyTrade.text: Benefit from market-leading entry prices and get tighter spreads and lower commissions when you upgrade your trading tier.

whyTrade.title: Expert support
whyTrade.text: Receive best-in-className digital support as standard and unlock even better personal service with our premium trading tiers.

benefits.title: Deposits and Withdrawals
benefits.text: Signup and confirm your email address to get instant access to our Trader's Room and MT4 trading platform. (~30 seconds).

benefits.title: 888x Leverage Trading
benefits.text: Deposit USD or Bitcoin using multiple payment methods to fund your personal account. (~2 minutes).

benefits.title: Top-Tier Security
benefits.text: Start trading multiple assets with leverage and the lowest fees.
